headline: Ulta Beauty Lifts Fiscal-Year Guidance as Second-Quarter Profit, Sales Rise
summary: Ulta Beauty  boosted its guidance for the fiscal year after logging higher profit and sales in its latest quarter as consumers continue to prioritize beauty and wellness products.  The cosmetics and fragrances retailer said Thursday it now expects earnings per share of $23.85 to $24.30, compared with its prior guidance of $22.65 to $23.20.  The Bolingbrook, Ill., company now forecasts sales of $12 billion to $12.1 billion for the year, up from its prior guidance for $11.5 billion to $11.7 billion.

headline: Ulta Beauty shines after annual forecast hike on steady demand, UK expansion
summary: Shares of the company were up 6% in trading after the bell.  The cosmetics retailer also expanded internationally with its July acquisition of UK high street chain Space NK.  Ulta has been adding celebrity-owned labels, such as Rihanna's Fenty Beauty, to its shelves and ramping up digital and marketing investments to deepen shopper engagement.

headline: Marvell Technology, Gap, Ulta Beauty: Stocks to Watch Afterhours
summary: ↗️ Affirm (AFRM): The buy now, pay later company swung to a profit, surpassing expectations, as its largest merchants helped boost volume. Shares rose 9% in postmarket trading. ↗️ Ulta Beauty (ULTA): The cosmetics and fragrances retailer bumped up its guidance for the fiscal year after logging higher profit and sales in its latest quarter.

headline: Ulta Beauty jumps on strong Q2 sales and higher 2025 outlook
summary: Investing.com -- Ulta Beauty Inc (NASDAQ:ULTA) shares surged 5.7% in after-hours trading Thursday after the company reported second-quarter results that exceeded Wall Street expectations and raised its full-year guidance. The performance was driven by broad-based strength across categories and notable improvements in operating efficiency.

headline: Ulta Beauty Posts Another Strong Quarter. The Stock Jumps.
summary: The cosmetics retailer’s adjusted earnings of $5.78 a share beat analysts’ estimates calling for $5.10 a share, according to FactSet.  Ulta also increased its guidance for the full year.  The new earnings range is $23.85 to $24.30 per share, higher than the $22.65 to $23.20 range issued earlier this year.

headline: Does Moroccanoil’s Ulta Launch and Board Changes Signal a New Strategic Phase for ULTA?
summary: Moroccanoil recently announced its expansion into Ulta Beauty, bringing its full range of haircare, body care, and fine fragrance products to 800 Ulta stores nationwide and Ulta.com as of August 24, 2025, while new directors with substantial industry experience were also appointed to Ulta's board effective September 1, 2025. This move increases Ulta Beauty’s access to premium, stylist-backed brands and strengthens its professional engagement, potentially enriching Ulta’s in-store guest...
